item.title: Mode Control Panel Switches – A/T Speed Mode Engage Switch (SPD)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided approach minimums do not require autothrottle use.

note.para: Autothrottle Speed mode cannot be manually selected.
A/T Speed mode is the default A/T mode after altitude capture on FLCH, VNAV, or G/A.
VNAV commands the A/T to speed determined by FMC.

numlitem.para: Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 2.

placard.para: Placard A/T SPD Mode Engage Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.
